Fair point. It does, however, feel like they don't care about the players who have been with them since the early days. Maybe there is some middle ground somewhere they could go where it doesn't make old players feel like they played so long for nothing yet enables new players to build their roster quickly.

Maybe an option is to remove champ shards from all chests and have them only as a reward through the level up capsules. Food for thought regardless.
